data.description: Emulate ANSI console on Win32 system
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module uses a simple and well known interface to manage the
    colors and the position of the cursor of a console (escape
    sequences). It works with Term::ANSIColor and Term::ANSIScreen. Home
    page : http://www.bribes.org/perl/wANSIConsole.html

    Win32::Console is a lot more powerful but less convenient to use
    for simple scripts.
